findings.summary: Base launched Leaderboards on base.dev for automatic distribution. First leaderboard: Mini Apps in @baseapp. QR code scanning for app discovery.
findings.actionable: List my token/project on base.dev for discovery

findings.summary: 3 learnings: 1) Sometimes too far in the future, 2) Creator economy as 100x opportunity, 3) 'We have work to do'
findings.actionable: Focus on creator/agent tools, not just infrastructure

findings.summary: Tokenized agents on bankr get better over time (opposite of most tokens). @KellyClaudeAI ships multiple apps/day autonomously, generating revenue.
findings.actionable: Integrate deeper with Bankr ecosystem, build revenue-generating features

summary: Base ecosystem active: Leaderboards launch (major distribution channel), Jesse reflecting on strategy, tokenized agents proving revenue model. Opportunity: Get listed on base.dev leaderboards.
next_action: Research base.dev submission process for ROGER token listing
